item.title: Hi, we’re Jenny and Krissy – and we’re taking over fitgreenmind. 😎 After years behind the scenes, we decided it’s time to step into the kitchen (because apparently Maya doesn’t want anymore and we didn’t want to let you down)… questionable idea, we know.🤭
item.description: Hi, we’re Jenny and Krissy – and we’re taking over fitgreenmind. 😎 After years behind the scenes, we decided it’s time to step into the kitchen (because apparently Maya doesn’t want anymore and we didn’t want to let you down)… questionable idea, we know.🤭

item.title: This week marks the end of Fitgreenmind as you know it — and the start of something even bigger. 👀 Fitgreenmind has grown more than I’ve ever imagined, and to lighten my load and make space for exciting new projects, we’re changing things up a bit. My mis

item.title: Melon seed milk 🥛 Yes, you can turn ANY melon seeds into a delicious milk… it tastes lovely nutty, slightly sweet and perfect for your coffee or cereal.😋 RECIPE (2 servings, 5min prep time): -1/4 cup (30g) melon seeds, rinsed -1 cup (250ml) water -1 date
item.description: Melon seed milk 🥛 Yes, you can turn ANY melon seeds into a delicious milk… it tastes lovely nutty, slightly sweet and perfect for your coffee or cereal.😋 RECIPE (2 servings, 5min prep time): -1/4 cup (30g) melon seeds, rinsed -1 cup (250ml) water -1 date

item.title: Homemade pretzels 🥨 This is @fitgreenmom’s secret recipe for the most delicious pretzel buns… they’re so soft, fluffy and I’d say simply perfect!😌🤝 RECIPE (10 pieces, 2h prep time): -600g flour -15g salt -15g sugar Mix well and make a well in the middle.
